sen.e: The Funabashi family is a descendant of Imperial Prince Toneri, a son of the 40th emperor, Emperor Temmu.

sen.e: Naritada KIYOHARA (Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank), Okurasho (Ministry of Treasury), Shonagon (lesser councilor of state)) (1409 - 1467) from the Muromachi period became the first kugyo (court noble) from the Kiyohara clan.

sen.j: その養子となった吉田兼倶の子清原宣賢（きよはらのぶかた）（正三位・侍従・少納言）（1457年 - 1550年）は明経道を研究整理してとり纏めた。
sen.e: His adopted son, Nobukata KIYOHARA (Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank), jiju (chamberlain), Shonagon (lesser councilor of state)) (1457 - 1550), who was a son of Kanetomo YOSHIDA, studied, organized and summarized the myogyodo.

sen.e: Nobukata KIYOHARA's daughter served the Muromachi Shogun Yoshiharu ASHIKAGA, and she was the biological mother of Yusai HOSOKAWA of the Hosokawa clan.
